title: Lower non-throwing async wait cancellation to explicit cancelled status without payload drift
feature: non-throwing cancellation status ABI mapping stability

cancelled status path does not carry success payload values

mode_matrix.name: optimized-o2
abi_requirements: optimized lowering preserves non-throwing cancellation status mapping semantics from -O0
